questions.question: If you want to improve your English,

choices.answer: you should listen to the teacher carefully.
you ought to read an English book.
you should speak Turkish during the lesson.
you shouldn't write anything in your notebooks during the lesson.

questions.question: If your grades are not really good,

choices.answer: You had better not go to school.
You ought to study hard.
You shouldn't tell your parents about this.
You should chat with your friends during the lesson.

questions.question: If you want to go to MUN,

choices.answer: You ought not to learn English well.
You had better not practise English.
You should study English harder.
You shouldn't listen to the teacher carefully.

questions.question: Egemen wants to get good marks from the exams.

choices.answer: He should play more computer games.
He had better watch TV at nights.
He had better not listen to the teachers.
He ought to study harder.

questions.question: Erdal wants to be good at English.

choices.answer: He had better listen to Ms. Kılınçat's advice carefully.
He had better not take notes during the lesson.
He ought not to do his homework.
He should ask questions if he doens't understand anything.
You should eat junk food.
You ought to do sports.
You had better drink cola and eat chocolate every day.
You shouldn't go for a walk very often.

questions.question: I want to go on holiday for ten days.

choices.answer: You ought not to come to school any more.
You should leave school and go.
You had better wait for the semester holiday.
You shouldn't leave your school. Your students need you.

questions.question: İnci wants to get a prize in MUN.

choices.answer: She should go to more Mun conferences.
She had better not go to any more Mun conferences.
She ought not to practise more.
She shouldn't be confident.

questions.question: I want to stay young and be more beautiful than Hadise:)

choices.answer: You should go to a plastic surgery.
You had better eat too much.
You ought not to do sports.
You are already more beautiful than her:)

questions.question: Enes wants to be a good football player.

choices.answer: He had better get a lot of weight.
He ought not to be careful about what to eat.
He should exercise playing football every week.
He shouldn't sleep well.

questions.question: If you want to be a good friend,

choices.answer: You should keep your friends' secrets.
You should always tell them the truth.
You had better respect them
You ought to listen to their advice.

questions.question: You want to create a good class..

choices.answer: You had better not listen to your friends.
You should chat with your friends while the teacher is speaking.
You should learn to respect to your friends and your teachers first.
You ought to sleep during the lesson.
